summary: This is a confidential email sent on July 27, 2019, containing a link to a New York Daily News article about Jeffrey Epstein's life behind bars at the Metropolitan Correctional Center in New York. The email appears to be sent to or from a Senior Officer Specialist at the Federal Bureau of Prisons.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: The subject of the linked New York Daily News article about his life behind bars at the Metropolitan Correctional Center.

events.title: New York Daily News article on Epstein's incarceration
events.description: A New York Daily News article was published detailing Jeffrey Epstein's life behind bars at the Metropolitan Correctional Center.

keyFacts: An email was sent on July 27, 2019, containing a link to a news article about Jeffrey Epstein's life in prison.
The email is marked as 'CONFIDENTIAL' and is associated with the SDNY (Southern District of New York).
The email references a Senior Officer Specialist at the U.S. Department of Justice Federal Bureau of Prisons.
The article was published by the New York Daily News on July 26, 2019.
Epstein was incarcerated at the Metropolitan Correctional Center in New York City at the time.
